ing: 1 fluid ounce melon-flavored fruit punch (such as Hawaiian PunchÂ® 'Mazin MelonÂ®)
des: "Created this gem on a 90-degree day in May! I needed something light and refreshing, and this fit the bill; so smooth.  Great combination of adult and child-friendly ingredients."
ins: Fill a shaker with ice. Pour vodka and punch over ice; cover and shake. Strain cocktail into a chilled martini glass.
